title: A learning result for continuous-time recurrent neural networks 1 1 Supported in part by US Air Forc

tldr.text: It is shown that the number of inputs needed for reliable generalization (the sample complexity of the learning problem) is upper bounded by an expression that grows polynomially with the dimension of the network and logarithmically with theNumber of output derivatives being matched.
